Actions.ActionName: Copy the selected Action(s) as Image
Adjust the image for 72DPI, if needed

ThenActions.ActionName: Get Image Pixel Size of Clipboard into 'kmfamImageSize'

Actions.ActionName: Write the image from the Clipboard to the file specified in TriggerValue
